original_query: SELECT MIN(c.Id) FROM comments as c, postHistory as ph, votes as v, users as u WHERE v.UserId = u.Id AND c.UserId = u.Id AND ph.UserId = u.Id AND ph.CreationDate>=CAST('2010-07-28 09:11:34' AS TIMESTAMP) AND ph.CreationDate<=CAST('2014-09-06 06:51:53' AS TIMESTAMP) AND u.DownVotes<=0 AND u.UpVotes>=0 AND u.UpVotes<=72
rewritten_query: CREATE VIEW E1 AS SELECT * FROM comments AS comments
CREATE VIEW E4 AS SELECT * FROM users AS users WHERE users.DownVotes <= 0 AND (CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) >= 0 AND CAST(users.UpVotes AS INTEGER) <= 72)

CREATE VIEW E2 AS SELECT * FROM postHistory AS postHistory WHERE CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) >= TIMESTAMP '2010-07-28 09:11:34' AND CAST(postHistory.CreationDate AS TIMESTAMP(0)) <= TIMESTAMP '2014-09-06 06:51:53'
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2 AS SELECT * FROM E4 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E2 WHERE E4.Id=E2.UserId)
CREATE VIEW E3 AS SELECT * FROM votes AS votes
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E4E2E3 AS SELECT * FROM E4E2 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E3 WHERE E4E2.Id=E3.UserId)
CREATE UNLOGGED TABLE E1E4E2E3 AS SELECT MIN(Id) AS EXPR$0 FROM E1 WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM E4E2E3 WHERE E1.UserId=E4E2E3.Id)
